attributes.action: stop ITV from stealing "Neighbours" from the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After twenty one years of broadcasting "Neighbours", the BBC is close to dropping the programme after being outbid by ITV. The BBC is currently thought to pay £25,000 an episode, but is understood to have offered to increase this to £70,000. ITV has reportedly offered up to £100,000 per episode. "Neighbours" belongs on the BBC and should not move!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
